ModMetaData.name: Expanded Materials Metals Lite Patch for Outposts Mines
ModMetaData.author: Daria40K
ModMetaData.description:
[LITE]Expanded Materials - Metals Patch for Vanilla Outposts Expanded Mines
This patch add the ores from [LITE]Expanded Materials - Metals to Vanilla Outposts Expanded so that they can be an output for the outposts mines.
